original_title: Lachlan Macquarie: The Father of Australia
overview: Biography of Lachlan Macquarie and his wife, Elizabeth, who arrived to govern the colony of New South Wales in Australia in 1810. In just over a decade, the couple transformed the prison colony into a proto nation.
tagline: In ten years he turned a prison colony into the foundation of a nation
title: Lachlan Macquarie: The Father of Australia
